verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On the eve of the West Virginia Senate primary] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: urged] [ARG1: voters in the state] [ARG2: to reject Republican Don Blankenship , a coal magnate who served a year in prison after a deadly mine explosion] .

On the eve of the West Virginia Senate primary , President Trump urged voters in the state to reject Republican Don Blankenship , [ARG0: a coal magnate] [R-ARG0: who] [V: served] [ARG1: a year in prison] [ARGM-TMP: after a deadly mine explosion] .
